contents.text: Welcome to 140 Proof in San Francisco, delivering the most precise way to advertise in mobile apps.
To launch or manage your advertising campaigns, press 1.
To start a new campaign, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with a campaign specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to set up a new mobile ad campaign.
I’m a veteran launching my first mobile ad campaign to promote my small business.
I need to launch a new programmatic mobile ad campaign with RTB and custom DSP parameters.
I need help setting up a new mobile advertising campaign.
I want to start a new mobile ad campaign to promote my physics tutoring service to undergraduates.

contents.text: To adjust your campaign’s targeting and optimization, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with a targeting expert.

navigationGoals: I need to adjust my campaign’s targeting settings.
I need to refine my campaign’s audience to better reach fellow veterans and military families on mobile apps.
I want to tweak my existing campaign’s geotargeting, frequency capping, and bid optimization settings.
I want to update my ad’s targeting and optimization settings.
I need to adjust my campaign’s targeting to reach students in my university’s physics department and optimize for workshop sign-ups.

contents.text: For account support and other inquiries, press 2.
To speak with technical support, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing an error in the ad platform and need technical help.
I’m having trouble accessing my campaign dashboard and need technical help to get it working again.
I’m encountering errors with the 140 Proof SDK integration in our app and need technical debugging assistance.
I’m having trouble accessing my ad account and need technical support.
I’m encountering errors integrating the advertising SDK and need technical support to resolve my tracking issues.

contents.text: For billing and invoice questions, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a question about a recent invoice charge.
I have a billing question about a recent charge on my advertising account.
I need to review and reconcile the line-item charges on my latest invoice and update our billing info.
I have a question about a charge on my billing invoice.
I have a question about last month’s ad spend and need a detailed breakdown of the invoice charges.
